ygData.subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Intro
ygData.msgSnippet: Tarew, thankyou for the information.  No, a game is not what I am looking for.  I am looking for people who study the mythological history of or practice the
ygData.messageBody:
Tarew, thankyou for the information.  No, a game is not what I am looking for.  I am looking for people who study the mythological history of or practice the art if wizardry.  I want to create from information I gather my own wizard, not use someone else's.  I want to get to know attitudes, and blend them all together in my imagination and come up with a resentful character that somehow gets over it and becomes good again.  But not in the usually Disney and they lived happily ever after style.  I need to create someone who is a freak in the head who learns to get along for the sake of whatever.  
Debra
